about.title: About Me
about.content: Hello, I am a passionate UI/UX Designer and Full-Stack Developer from the sunny south of France, based in Montpellier. I love creating intuitive and visually engaging designs using tools like Figma and Photoshop, while developing modern and efficient applications with C#, React, and ASP.NET. My goal is to bridge design and technology to create solutions that are both practical and aesthetically pleasing. Outside of work, I enjoy traveling, discovering new places, and finding inspiration in different cultures. Whether it's exploring the latest tech trends or enjoying the Mediterranean lifestyle, I am always looking for new ideas to incorporate into my projects.

seo.title: Google Visibility Expert
seo.content:
Every optimization counts: a well-ranked website turns a simple search into a conquered client.

I help SMEs and small businesses be found on Google through ultra-performing websites and expert management of their local presence.

Specialized in technical and local SEO, I optimize every element: loading speed, site structure, targeted content and Google My Business listing.

I design custom SEO strategies, with monthly performance tracking and continuous adjustments to maximize your visibility and attract new clients every month.

developer.title: Full-stack Developer
developer.content:
I help entrepreneurs and freelancers get a modern, fast website with good Google ranking, using Next.js, a technology renowned for its performance.

I also integrate useful tools like forms, animations, or booking systems into a site that matches your brand, is easy to use, and is designed to convert.

A passionate autodidact, I completed my background with a degree in web development, so I can offer clear, reliable, and tailor-made solutions.

designer.title: UI/UX Designer
designer.content:
Every pixel matters: great design turns a casual visit into a memorable experience.

I help entrepreneurs build a clear, professional visual identity that reflects their world and catches the eye.

Certified in UI/UX design and passionate about aesthetics, I create custom interfaces with Figma and Photoshop, paying attention to every detail.

I design intuitive user flows, with elegant animations that bring the site to life without hindering navigation. My goal: to highlight what you offer, with clarity and style.
